meanings.sent1: The friendly dog was unsuspicious of the new visitor.
meanings.sent2: She felt unsuspicious of her best friend's intentions.
meanings.sent3: The unsuspicious squirrel happily accepted the acorn from the stranger.
meanings.sent4: The unsuspicious clouds floated lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The unsuspicious smile on his face put everyone at ease.

meanings.sent1: The old book was unsuspicious of any damage.
meanings.sent2: He remained unsuspicious of the hidden treasure's location.
meanings.sent3: The unsuspicious cat confidently explored the new room.
meanings.sent4: The unsuspicious river flowed peacefully through the valley.
meanings.sent5: Her unsuspicious behavior made her the perfect spy.
